title: Speed for Wear
description: Speed - Measure your Speed  Speed shows you current/max speed going down a mountain in powder,  jumping off a cliff skydiving, out on the sea or just driving your car.  • Mph• Km/h• Knots• m/s• ft/s Info:Buying or using my apps guarantees support.  Note:Works ONLY with Android Wear supported watcheshttp://www.android.com/wearIf you have an Sony SmartWatch 1 or SmartWatch 2, download my other app "Speed for SmartWatch". It's uses your built in GPS, so it only works outside where you can get hold of the satellites in the sky.Either use your local Wear watch GPS or make sure your GPS is turned ON in your Mobile in "High accuracy" Mode.   New Support for local Wear GPS and Ambient mode. Power saving battery feature and GPS delay settings. Voice command Tap on your Wear watch and say "Start Speed" Long press to get max speed, long press again to get current speed.There is no app icon in the Mobile menu drawer.
descriptionHTML:
Speed - Measure your Speed

Speed shows you current/max speed going down a mountain in powder, jumping off a cliff skydiving, out on the sea or just driving your car.

• Mph
• Km/h
• Knots
• m/s
• ft/s

Info:
Buying or using my apps guarantees support.

Note:
Works ONLY with Android Wear supported watches
http://www.android.com/wear

If you have an Sony SmartWatch 1 or SmartWatch 2, download my other app "Speed for SmartWatch".

It's uses your built in GPS, so it only works outside where you can get hold of the satellites in the sky.
Either use your local Wear watch GPS or make sure your GPS is turned ON in your Mobile in "High accuracy" Mode.

New Support for local Wear GPS and Ambient mode. Power saving battery feature and GPS delay settings.

Voice command Tap on your Wear watch and say "Start Speed"

Long press to get max speed, long press again to get current speed.
There is no app icon in the Mobile menu drawer.
comments: Works Perfectly Downloaded this on a whim.  Tried it for the first time today on the drive home from work.  Matched my vehicles speedometer within 2-3%,  Cool app that really only has utility when you can't get speed from an embedded readout (speedometer).  Will be useful when skateboarding, running, boating, etc.    Thanks Dev!

Great App Dear Speed Wear 65 developer. I like the application for high performance sailing. I would be so much better however if you could provide speed in tenth of units (knots in my case). thank you.

Great app! I really like your speedometer app, it is one of the few that has knots as units. Could you add an option for the app to show extra decimal places? Id like to use the app for sailing, but I need it to display 1/10ths of a knot (or even 1/100ths). Also if you added an option to display the latest GPS heading on my watch that would be perfect!
recentChanges: Support for standalone Watch GPS and Ambient mode.
